alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Putnam (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 10:18AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A snow shower will affect Northwestern Putnam and Central Bureau counties through 1045 AM CST... At 1015 AM CST, a snow shower was located over Manlius, or 9 miles northwest of Princeton, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Brief moderate snow and wind gusts up to 40 mph SOURCE...Radar. IMPACTS...Snow covered surfaces including roadways, bridges, overpasses, and sidewalks. Difficulty seeing while driving. Locations impacted include... Princeton, Hennepin, Walnut, Wyanet, Tiskilwa, Bureau Junction, Putnam, Manlius, Milo, New Bedford, Providence, Lake Thunderbird, Florid, Lone Tree Corners, and Bureau County Fairgrounds. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Illinois between mile markers 45 and 58. Interstate 180 between mile markers 1 and 9. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...
